message.content:
I need to identify the line item in the income statement that represents costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see that "Administrative Expenses" is the line item that corresponds to the general management and administration costs of the entity.

The value for Administrative Expenses is 294758.34 as of 2024-02-05.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '294758.34'}}
```
